description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Annan Athletic vs Kelty Hearts in the Scottish League One
title: Annan Athletic vs Kelty Hearts: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Annan Athletic vs Kelty Hearts: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Aidan Smith (Annan Athletic) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Goal!
Goal! Annan Athletic 2, Kelty Hearts 1. Luca Ross (Annan Athletic) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Max Kilsby following a corner.
Post
Attempt missed. Aidan Smith (Annan Athletic) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
Goal!
Goal! Annan Athletic 1, Kelty Hearts 1. Max Kilsby (Annan Athletic) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the top right corner. Assisted by Willie Gibson with a cross following a corner.
